title: Bloomberg Intelligence Radio: Earnings, IPOs, Boeing (Podcast)
itunes:title: Bloomberg Intelligence Radio: Earnings, IPOs, Boeing (Podcast)
description:
In this week's Bloomberg Intelligence Radio show, Karen Ubelhart discusses Caterpillar's outlook, Mike McGlone talks about the outlook for crude oil and grain prices and U.S. farmers' depressed incomes, and George Ferguson looks at how Boeing's Max affected results at United and Delta. Andrew Eisenson explains why some unicorns may not go public and Francis Chan digs into China's tech and fintech growth. And U.S. equity strategist Gina Martin Adams asks if earnings have reached a trough. Bloomberg Intelligence provides in-depth research and data on more than 2,000 companies and 130 industries. Hosts: Alix Steel and Paul Sweeney

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
